parameters.name: ConnectionProperties
parameters.description: The specific connection configuration of the computing resource, including the connection address, access identity, and environment information. The environment type (EnvType) of the computing resource is a member attribute of this object, including DEV (development environment) and PROD (production environment). The value is not case-sensitive.

parameters.name: ConnectionPropertiesMode
parameters.description: The category of the computing resource to be added. Different types have different subtypes and corresponding parameter schema constraints. Examples: InstanceMode and UrlMode.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the computing resource. The maximum length is 3000 characters.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the computing resource.
